name: Grapple Dog
description:
About
Grapple Dog is an exhilarating 2D pixel-art platformer. Use your awesome grappling hook to clear tricky challenges as Pablo, the Grapple Dog! Sail across 6 colourful worlds with a crew of fearless adventurers to stop the robotic overlord Nul from destroying the world!
Features
Smooth free-flowing platforming with unique grappling mechanics!
Buttery smooth 60fps gameplay!
A bold and colourful art-style from a pixel-art veteran!
A funky and fresh soundtrack!
33 levels filled with hidden collectables and secret areas to explore!
Test your speed in Time Trial mode!
Each world ends with a spectacular Boss battle against giant robot foes!
A light-hearted adventure story with fun characters!
